product_name: Omega Pacific Dirtbag Dash Quickdraw Rack Pack - Package of 6
long_description: Grab the Omega Pacific Dirtbag Dash Quickdraw Rack Pack to get geared up for climbing without breaking the bank. The pack includes 6 quickdraws and a locking carabiner. Quickdraws have wiregate 'biners with gates facing opposite directions; by opposing the 'biners on the draw, the possibility of simultaneous gate opening is reduced. 10cm Dyneema slings are sewn snugly around the bottom carabiners, helping to prevent them from shifting positions while clipping the rope. Use the included screwgate locking carabiner when building anchors. Slings offer a stout 22kN breaking strength.
short_description: Grab the Omega Pacific Dirtbag Dash Quickdraw Rack Pack to get geared up for climbing without breaking the bank. The pack includes 6 quickdraws and a locking carabiner.
